waveDashUnify.enableConvert.title: Enable character conversion
waveDashUnify.disableConvert.title: Disable character conversion
waveDashUnify.fullwidthTildeToWaveDash.d:
Convert fullwidth tilde (0x8F 0xA2 0xB7) to wave dash (0xA1 0xC1).
This setting is effective only when the 'waveDashUnify.enableConvert' is true.
waveDashUnify.numeroSignToNumeroSign.des:
Convert numero sign (0x8F 0xA2 0xF1) to numero sign (0xAD 0xE2).
This setting is effective only when the 'waveDashUnify.enableConvert' is true.
waveDashUnify.statusBarFormat.markdownDe:
The format of the status bar item.

Available variables:
- ${statusIcon}: Icons indicating conversion enable/disable
- ${waveDashAndFullwidthTildeCount}: The number of wave dash and fullwidth tilde characters in the active editor
- ${numeroSignCount}: The number of numero sign characters in the active editor
